languages.text: {n}Луна над оскверненным сектором Януса окрасилась в алый. Тысячи серфов, пригнанные слугами Вистенцы на место "процедуры", пролили кровь в землю, и она пустилась по рекам мира.{/n}

{n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Луна над оскверненным сектором Януса окрасилась в алый. Тысячи серфов, пригнанные слугами Вистенцы на место "процедуры", пролили кровь в землю, и она пустилась по рекам мира.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus had turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants at the place of conducting the "procedure", have spilled their blood unto the soil, mixing it into the world's rivers.{/n}

{n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus had turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants at the place of conducting the "procedure", have spilled their blood unto the soil, mixing it into the world's rivers.{/n}

{n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus has turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, have taken part in her "procedure," spilling their blood unto the soil and mixing it into the world's rivers.{/n}

{n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}加努斯腐化区域的空中，月亮变成了血红色。成千上万的仆役被维丝坦萨的仆人抓来参与她的“仪式”。他们的鲜血被洒入土壤，混入这个世界的河流之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}加努斯腐化区域的空中，月亮变成了血红色。成千上万的仆役被维丝坦萨的仆人抓来参与她的“仪式”。他们的鲜血被洒入土壤，混入这个世界的河流之中。{/n}
{n}加努斯腐化区域的空中，月亮变成了血红色。成千上万的仆役被维丝坦萨的仆人抓来参与她的‘仪式’。他们的鲜血被洒入土壤，混入这个世界的河流之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La luna sobre el sector corrupto de Janus se ha vuelto roja. Miles de siervos, acorralados por los sirvientes de Vistenza, participaron en su «intervención», derramando su sangre en el suelo y mezclándola con los ríos del mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La luna sobre el sector corrupto de Janus se ha vuelto roja. Miles de siervos, acorralados por los sirvientes de Vistenza, participaron en su «intervención», derramando su sangre en el suelo y mezclándola con los ríos del mundo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヤヌスの堕落したセクターの上空の月が赤く変色した。ヴィステンツァの従者が狩り集めた何千人もの農奴が、彼女の"プロシージャー"に参加し、その血を土にこぼし、惑星の川に混ぜた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヤヌスの堕落したセクターの上空の月が赤く変色した。ヴィステンツァの従者が狩り集めた何千人もの農奴が、彼女の"プロシージャー"に参加し、その血を土にこぼし、惑星の川に混ぜた。{/n}
{n}ヤヌスの堕落したセクターの上空の月が赤く変色した。ヴィステンツァの従者が狩り集めた何千人もの農奴が、彼女の"プロシージャー"に参加し、その血を土にこぼし、惑星の川に混ぜた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lune qui surplombe le secteur corrompu de Janus devient écarlate. Des milliers de serfs, rameutés par les serviteurs de Vistenza, participent à sa fameuse « procédure », répandant leur sang sur le sol et le laissant se mêler aux rivières du monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lune qui surplombe le secteur corrompu de Janus devient écarlate. Des milliers de serfs, rameutés par les serviteurs de Vistenza, participent à sa fameuse « procédure », répandant leur sang sur le sol et le laissant se mêler aux rivières du monde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mond über dem verderbten Sektor auf Janus färbte sich rot. Tausende von Vistenzas Dienern zusammengetriebene Sklaven wurden Teil ihrer "Prozedur". Ihr Blut sicherte in den Boden und vermischte sich mit den Flüssen der Welt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mond über dem verderbten Sektor auf Janus färbte sich rot. Tausende von Vistenzas Dienern zusammengetriebene Sklaven wurden Teil ihrer "Prozedur". Ihr Blut sicherte in den Boden und vermischte sich mit den Flüssen der Welt.{/n}

{n}Der Mond über dem verderbten Sektor auf Janus hat sich rot gefärbt. Tausende von Sklaven, von Vistenzas Dienern zusammengetrieben, haben an ihrer "Prozedur" teilgenommen, die Erde mit ihrem Blut getränkt und es in die Flüsse der Welt gemischt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Janus'un yozlaşmış sektörünü aydınlatan ay, kızıla döndü. Binlerce köle, Vistenza'nın hizmetkârları tarafından toplanarak "prosedür" dâhilinde kullanıldı. Toprağı bulayan kanları, dünyadaki nehirlerle bir oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moon above the corrupted sector of Janus turned red. Thousands of serfs, rounded up by Vistenza's servants, became part of her "procedure," their blood spilling onto the soil and mixing into the world's rivers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Janus'un yozlaşmış sektörünü aydınlatan ay, kızıla döndü. Binlerce köle, Vistenza'nın hizmetkârları tarafından toplanarak "prosedür" dâhilinde kullanıldı. Toprağı bulayan kanları, dünyadaki nehirlerle bir oldu.{/n}
